recipesJson.name: SaturdIY: Sticky Limeade
recipesJson.author: ConcreteRiver
recipesJson.description:
Mixed live for Addy Tuney on Fresh's show where we tried to mix some of the profiles we've been banging our heads on.

A big bright lime flavor with some popsicle stickiness.

I <3 Addy Tuney.

reviews.text: Love this recipe! Tastes like a melted lime popsicle. Those 2 limes together make a perfect candy/artificial lime.
